title: Vietnam’s reports drop in foreign investment amid global economic worries
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Vietnam received nearly $16.8 billion in foreign direct investment as of August 20 this year, down 12.3 per cent anually, according to the country’s Foreign Investment Agency under the Ministry of Planning and Investment. In the period, a remarkable decrease
